alert.note: Alert for Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:59PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. Lawrence County through 400 PM EDT... At 259 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Norwood, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Potsdam, Canton, Norfolk, Colton, Norwood, Hermon, Madrid, Pierrepont, Russell, North Stockholm, Pyrites, West Parishville, Higley Flow State Park, North Russell, West Stockholm, West Potsdam, South Colton, Stockholm Center, Hannawa Falls, and West Pierrepont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
